org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.monster

Interface Guardian

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Agent, Aquatic, CompositeValueStore<DataHolder,DataManipulator<?,?>>, Creature, DataHolder, DataSerializable, Entity, Hostile, Identifiable, Living, Locatable, Monster, ProjectileSource, PropertyHolder, TeamMember, Translatable, ValueContainer<DataHolder>

    public interface Guardian
extends Aquatic, Monster
    Represents a Guardian.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<Living> getBeamTarget()
      Gets the target of the guardian's beam or Optional.empty() otherwise.

      Sets the target of the guardian's beam.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.Agent

    • Method Detail

      • getBeamTarget

        Optional<Living> getBeamTarget()
        Gets the target of the guardian's beam or Optional.empty() otherwise.
        Returns:
        An optional containing the target, if any

      • setBeamTarget

        void setBeamTarget(Living entity)
        Sets the target of the guardian's beam. Setting a null value removes the target.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity or null to clear it
